FuncDef:
The measure-point command configures a measurement point for collecting Y.1731 statistics.
The undo measure-point command restores the default configuration.
By default, a measurement point for collecting Y.1731 statistics is a PW interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the measurement point is an AC interface.
-

Indicates that the measurement point is a PW interface.
-

Specifies the ID of a MEP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To use Y.1731 to collect link performance statistics on the PW side in VLL networking, run the measure-point command to configure a measurement point for collecting Y.1731 statistics.
Prerequisites
An MD has been created using the cfm md command, and an MA has been created using the ma command.
